name: Montgom
bio: Taking after his WW2 general namesake, Bernard Montgomery, Montgom moved into management after following the well know addage, 'Those who can't play, manage' in early February. Although yet to fruit some results, the board has full confidence in Montgom. Vive le Montgom!

name: George
bio: George's playing career has sadly had to come to an end with his recent injury. He will be a valuable addition to the management team bringing with him his strong tactical awareness.

name: Will F
bio: Will brings the 'zest' to Infidels F.C. management team. Tall, dark and hansome, Will has many aspirations
